Mod.Name: Trance Seek
Mod.Author: DV
Mod.IncompatibleWith: Alternate Fantasy,Amazing Quina,Beatrix Mod,Black Cat - Endgame Shop,David Bowie Edition,Freya Game+,Garnet is Main Character,Perfect Stats,Play As Kuja,Playable Character Pack,Tantalus
Mod.Description:
A hard mod that allows you to experience a new whole adventure! All the monsters and bosses have been redesigned (not only a stats boost but all the AIs are revisited), new skills, mechanics and many other things!
Currently, Trance Seek is... - A thoughtfully increased difficulty, designed for players seeking challenge (5 difficulties modes available !) - A complete overhaul of all combat, in terms of stats, AI and skills. - Around 30 new bosses added (including 2 superbosses): all the game's bosses have been reworked to offer different mechanics and more! - The game has a total of 84 SA + 84 additional enhanced versions (WIP). - All characters have 60 SA available (not counting boosted versions, so a total of 120 SA each!). - Each character has its own unique passive or mechanic. +40 new skills added. - 59 new items... but more to come ! - And lots more ^_^
This is not an EXTREME hardcore difficult mod: it only adds a higher difficulty than the original version while keeping a constant progression. But it's still a hard mode ! So be prepared for a challenge... you need to have a good basic understanding of the game (particularly ATB management). The entire difficulty system will be reworked when Disc 4 is released.
It's currently a demo : Disc1/2/3 available but almost +30 hours of gameplay ! Don't hesitate to try!
/_!_\ IMPORTANT /_!_\ Recommended language : Français / English (UK) Not supported language : Japanese (a lot of things get deleted... need to wait until full release... sorry !)

Mod.Name: Chocobo Hot and Cold QoL
Mod.Author: CheddarBung
Mod.Description:
Chocobo Hot and Cold QoL
Quality-of-life tweaks for Final Fantasy IX’s Chocobo Hot & Cold that respect vanilla progression. Multiple modes adjust RNG to suit different playstyles, from the untouched classic experience to streamlined options for faster chocograph progression. Compatible with Alternate Fantasy and Ferny Fantasy. Load above them in the mod order.
Modes
Chocobo Naturalist (Recommended)
Balanced for real-time play without Turbo. Averages ~2½ chocographs within the first six digs, with rewards scaling for higher dig counts. Lets you play a handful of focused sessions, have a good time, and be done — without Turbo and without feeling like you’re cheating.
Chocographer
100% chance to find chocographs and pieces when available. For players who want quick access to Ozma and rewards without RNG.
Lucky Beak
Speeds up the vanilla turbo experience without turning Hot & Cold into a cheat. Averages ~2½ chocographs over an eight-dig round, allows multiple finds per session, and keeps RNG intact. Designed for Turbo play with fewer sessions and steady progress.
Vanilla
Completely untouched Hot & Cold behavior. Useful as a dedicated override for mods that edit Barrel_38, Barrel_41, or Barrel_46.

Mod.Name: Perfect Stats
Mod.Author: Emeiru
Mod.Description:
[!] A new save game is recommended [!] Removes the equipment stat-boosting mechanic and replaces it with a fixed additional per level stat-gain. Players will no longer need to mind their equipment and wear stat-boosting gear on level-up. Party members will always achieve a fixed maximum stat just by leveling. Note that this will naturally decrease the difficulty of the game due to stats having linear progression now. A new save game is required to apply these changes, but if you installed this mod mid-game, you can also visit Chocobo's Forest to inject the mod's changes, level up, and see the new stats.
Choose ONLY one of the three stats settings:
Perfect Stats - Partially based on KADFC Max Stats Guide, this setting will allow the party to achieve near-perfect stats as if they pursued a level 1 max stats run. Significantly decreases game difficulty due to overall higher stats.
Perfect Rebalanced - Max stats configuration by Emeiru, aims to buff party members with low combined stats and make it rebalanced across the board.
No Bonus Stat Growth - Completely removes the bonus stat growth formula. Optional choice to remove stat management altogether, making the game harder.
Optional: Fixed Magic Stones - Reworks the magic stone growth formula to ensure every party member will get their max number of magic stones.

Mod.Name: FernySupportTweaks
Mod.Author: FernyFer
Mod.Description:
Changes some Support Abilities to be "subjectively" more useful! You can enable as many as you want.
Divine Light - (Replaces "Auto-Reflect" Support Ability) - Completely drains the Trance bar to stop a character from being KO'd if the Trance bar is at least 50% full.
Trancer - (Replaces "Ability Up" Support Ability) - All attacks now slightly increase the Trance gauge. - High Tide increases the amount of Trance gained. - HIGHLY suggested you use this option with "Kupo Tweaks or Exp , AP, Gil , Rewards Modifier" mod to alter AP gains from losing the Ability Up support ability.
Gambling Strikes - (Replaces Zidane's "Bandit" Support Ability) - Zidane's damage output randomly ranges from 50% to 200%. - HIGHLY suggested you enable "100% Steal Rate" cheat in Memoria engine to offset losing the Bandit support ability.
Glass Cannon - (Replaces "Auto-Float" Support Ability) - Increases all damage dealt by 60%, but reduces MaxHP by 40%.
Dyne Booster - (Zidane Only) - All of Zidane's Trance abilities deals 2x damage when his HP falls below 20%. - Damage at endgame will easily hit 9,999 damage cap when this triggers. - (OPTIONAL) Enable "Break Damage Limit" cheat in Memoria Engine to allow damage to break 9,999 cap.
Defence+ - (Replaces "Gambler Defense" Support Ability) - Gambler Defense was an abysmally useless Special Ability. - Now increases Defence and Magic Defence by 5%.
Lucky! - (Replaces "Level Up" Support Ability) - There are a few mods out there that allow you that alter your EXP gain... so, I figured the "Level Up" support ability could get a facelift. - Now increases Critical Strike Chance by 10!
HP Leech - (Replaces "Add Status" Support Ability) - Attacks will now leech a small amount of HP from the target to heal the user. - The "Add Status" is now a global passive - no longer needing to be equipped for the effect to be active. Always found it kinda pointless to add Status Effects to weapons and then making them moot if you didn't have this Support Ability equipped.
MP Leech - (Replaces "MP Attack" Support Ability) - Attacks will now leech a small amount of MP from the target to heal the user. - This ability makes sense in my game because I'm playing the Alternate Fantasy mod and almost all my characters now have skills that deal damage and use MP, so there is no reason to drain my MP to use a regular attack when I could just use one of my skills and do the same thing.
Speed+ - (Replaces "Flee-Gil" Support Ability) - Flee-Gil is actual doodoo, now it's actually useful! - Now increases Speed by 10%.
Note/Credit: "Divine Light" idea and code adapted from the Memoria Engine wiki: https://github.com/Albeoris/Memoria/wiki/Supporting-ability-features

A modular Final Fantasy IX Trance system overhaul!
Do you think the Trance system in Final Fantasy IX is a steaming hot pile of... well, you know. Well, look no further! I introduce to you the newest addition to my gameplay overhaul suite: Ferny Trance Tweaks!

Trance - MP Reduction * Reduces MP costs of Blue Magic, White Magic, Black Magic, and Summons while in Trance by 50%.
Trance - Crit Boost * Applies an innate +25% bonus to Critical Hit Chance while in Trance.
Trance - Patch for `Ferny Support Tweaks` * Includes everything in the `Overhaul System` option. * FernySupportTweaks adds a new Support Ability: `Trancer` which allows the player to build Trance via offensive actions. this has been coded into this mod and is now redundant. This patch changes up `Trancer` with `Spirit+` which instead increases Spirit by +5% (which helps scale the amount of Trance you gain on all actions).
Enjoy!

Mod.Name: Mistwake UI
Mod.Author: Daniel Vilela / dkPsycho
Mod.Description:
Mistwake UI is more than just a visual overhaul of Final Fantasy IX — it’s a tribute. Created by fans who grew up mesmerized by every detail of this masterpiece, the mod was born out of a desire to give back for the impact the game had on our lives. With a respectful and meticulous reinterpretation, we aimed to honor everything that made FFIX a classic of the 2000s, enhancing its beauty through a fresh perspective.
This version includes:
A redesigned look for menus, interface, dialogue boxes, and other refined elements New portraits for all characters, including side characters and extras Exclusive new artwork for each of the 8 protagonists at the moment they are recruited New background illustrations for the title screen, Game Over, and disc transitions New map name presentations, now accompanied by icons that represent each location Mistwake is a love letter to the world of Gaia — and a gift to everyone who, like us, was moved by it.
PT-BR
Mistwake UI é mais do que uma repaginação visual de Final Fantasy IX — é uma homenagem. Criado por fãs que cresceram encantados com cada detalhe dessa obra-prima, o mod nasceu do desejo de retribuir o impacto que o jogo teve em nossas vidas. Com uma releitura respeitosa e detalhista, buscamos valorizar tudo o que fez de FFIX um clássico dos anos 2000, exaltando sua beleza com um novo olhar.
Esta versão inclui: Novo visual para menus, interface, caixa de diálogo e outros elementos refinados Novos retratos para todos os personagens, incluindo secundários e extras Novas artes exclusivas para cada um dos 8 protagonistas no momento em que são recrutados Novas artes de fundo, para a tela inicial, Game Over e transições de disco Novas apresentações dos nomes de mapas, agora acompanhadas por ícones que representam cada local
Mistwake é uma carta de amor ao mundo de Gaia — e um presente para todos que, como nós, se emocionaram com ele.

Simply install it and select it manually in the Memoria launcher settings to enjoy all the visual elegance that Mistwake offers.

Mod.Name: Gaia Bless the Soundtrack
Mod.Author: Ehrgeiz
Mod.Description:
Replaces the battle music with either remixes of original songs (from FFIX) or tracks from other video games (both original & remixed). Multiple choices for a single track to choose from, as Ferny would say "Best of both worlds!", enjoy! --Echoes of Gaia (formerly known as "Specific Fights") is an optional music expansion that replaces all battle music with individual songs, giving FFIX the epic feeling of a remake we've longed deserved (And probably will never get).
Current Music List: Battle 1 has currently 6 Custom Tracks Swords of Fury has currently 3 Custom Tracks Victory Fanfare has currently 3 Custom Track Battle 2 has currently 8 Custom Tracks Run! has currently 7 Custom Tracks Faerie Battle has currently 2 Custom Tracks Festival of the Hunt has currently 3 Custom Tracks The Wavering Blade has currently 5 Custom Tracks Ambush Attack has currently 1 Custom Tracks Something to Protect has currently 4 Custom Tracks Not Alone has currently 2 Custom Tracks Dark Messenger has currently 5 Custom Tracks Final Battle has currently 3 Custom Tracks
If you would like to listen to replaced/custom tracks early on:
Method 1: -Start the game via Memoria -In the main menu press Ctrl + Alt + Shift + S to open the Sound View -Go to BGM and click the music ID you'd wish to listen to. More details on this website: https://github.com/Albeoris/Memoria/wiki/List-of-musics
-Tracks for Echoes of Gaia start from Sounds01/BGM_/music123 (149)
Method 2: -Playlists on YouTube: Music Replacements: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLxZLGetTfK6TcO2xFBoS76mvFnxryStH7&si=Ftg_Pz2MkSpIuqzf
Echoes of Gaia: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLxZLGetTfK6TcO2xFBoS76mvFnxryStH7&si=53_R3gWKoWC7X-hK
Shoutout: Ferny - For guiding me on setting up mods and his continuous support. SamSamTS - Also for guidance on mod set ups. Tsuna - For helping me understanding certain codes for adding new music tracks and the like. Tirlititi - For helping me understand coding for Hades Workshop. DV - For helping me with codes for CS scripts & Sequence files.
All original music in this mod belongs to their respective composers, I do NOT own them. Check the Music Credit List.txt file within the mod's folder for details.

--[v1.3.0]-- More songs added! Run, Ambush Attack, Something to Protect, and Not Alone has been added to the multiple choice music list Music for FULL SUMMON ANIMATIONS has now been added (EoG only) *NEW FEATURE* Battle music for Quale is available (EoG only) The battle music for Black Waltz No.1/Sealion & Black Waltz No.2 has been changed (EoG only) --As of this update the music within the Echoes of Gaia expansion goes up to the very end of Disc 3, MORE TO COME, stay tuned!

However, it is currently only compatible with the vanilla version of the game, but compatibility with game overhauled mods (like TranceSeek & Alternate Fantasy) will be happening soon! --As of this update the Specific Fights music goes up to the crash scene in Lindblum, but MORE MUSIC UNDERWAY, stay tuned!

Mod.Description: Diese Mod behebt ein paar Rechtschreibfehler und aktualisiert die deutsche Übersetzung von FF9 auf die neue deutsche Rechtschreibung. Beispiel: "Wir müßen hier weg!" -> "Wir müssen hier weg!". Diese Mod ist NICHT notwendig, wenn ihr mit "Alternate Fantasy" spielt, dort ist "Modern German" bereits integriert.

Mod.Name: Chinese (FFSky Rebirth)
Mod.Author: Team "Tribute to FFIX cn 2008"
Mod.Description:
水晶的记忆 十七载的传承
ChineseFFSkyRebirth 是一款基于 Memoria 引擎开发的中文mod，全面继承了 2008 年 《最终幻想 IX》PS 版汉化版的所有元素，并在此基础上进行了进一步的优化与提升。
本作不仅完整保留了当年汉化组的工作成果，还在Memoria引擎的帮助下进行了多项增强，使得这款经典汉化版在新技术的加持下焕发新生。
包括：1、天幻版文本移植与改进。2、含文字的图片汉化。3、所有场景地名图片汉化且调整尺寸适应大屏幕。4、开场和结局动画的优化处理。
我们致敬原最终幻想9汉化组的所有成员，诚挚感谢memoria引擎成员Tirlititi的无私帮助，同时也向为本mod付出热情和贡献的朋友致以最高的敬意。
Team "Tribute to FFIX cn 2008" 祝您游戏愉快！
Mod.PatchNotes: Version 0.9 为最终幻想IX 2008年ps版汉化的移植作品，在此基础上重新制作和调整了全部图片部分，以及结局动画。

Mod.Name: VVsRandomizer
Mod.Author: VVilmot
Mod.Description:
A mod to give each playthrough a fresh feel, with many different options to customize your experience.
Download this mod from 'Nexus' and run the executable.
Features; - Item randomization - Ability randomization - Enemy randomization (BETA) - Custom weapons and gear - New Chocographs - New textbox colours - Challenge options - Seed input to share the experience
